title: Vampire lady (dNetHack)
html:
Vampire lady (dNetHack)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
V vampire lady (No tile)
Difficulty 18
Attacks Claw 5d12 physical, Bite 1d8 vampiric
V vampire lady (No tile)
Difficulty 18
Attacks

Claw 5d12 physical, Bite 1d8 vampiric

Base level 15
Base experience 576
Speed 10
Base AC -8
Base MR 50
Alignment -9 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 2900
Nutritional value 400
Size large
Resistances cold, sleep, poison

A vampire lady:

  • can survive underwater.
  • does not breathe.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • regenerates HP quickly.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is undead.
  • is a lord to its kind.
  • is female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • resists death magic.
  • is a vampire.

A vampire lady, V, is a type of monster that appears in dNetHack, notdNetHack and notnotdNetHack. The vampire lady is a female counterpart to the vampire lords that has lower movement speed, but much stronger claw attacks.

Vampire ladies possess cold resistance, sleep resistance and poison resistance.

Generation

Randomly generated vampire ladies are always created hostile. A female vampire can grow up into a vampire lady.

A vampire lady may appear as the ruler of a randomly-generated throne room - her court can contain vampires, random Z, random M, flesh golems, werewolves, floating eyes, gargoyles, winged gargoyles, quasits, black puddings, wraiths, phantasms, ghosts, maids, weeping willows, and swamp nymphs.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A '''vampire lady''', {{blue|V}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[dNetHack]], [[notdNetHack]] and [[notnotdNetHack]]. The vampire lady is a female counterpart to the [[vampire lord]]s that has lower movement [[speed]], but much stronger claw attacks.

Vampire ladies possess [[cold resistance]], [[sleep resistance]] and [[poison resistance]].

==Generation==
Randomly generated vampire ladies are always created hostile. A female [[vampire]] can [[grow up]] into a vampire lady.

A vampire lady may appear as the ruler of a randomly-generated [[Throne room#dNetHack|throne room]] - her court can contain vampires, random [[Zombie (dNetHack)|{{white|Z}}]], random {{mcsl|M}}, [[flesh golem]]s, [[werewolves]], [[floating eye]]s, [[gargoyle]]s, [[winged gargoyle]]s, [[quasit]]s, [[black pudding]]s, [[wraith]]s, [[phantasm]]s, [[ghost]]s, [[maid]]s, [[weeping willow]]s, and [[swamp nymph]]s.
